data.name: The Edge Of The World Z (Will Shock You)
data.detailed_description:
THIRD PERSON SCI FI SHOOTER GAME(SINGLE AND MULTIPLAYER),COLLECT WEAPONES AND FRIENDS TO FIGHT AND SURVIVE AND SAVE THE WORLD THAT HAVE BEEN CAPTURED BY SCI FI ENEMIES , COMPLETE MISSION AND LOT OF LEVELS(FROM EASY TO HARD)
THIS GAME CONTAIN ARENA AND SPECIAL STORY AND MULTIPLAYER

*SINGLE PLAYER:
-STORY IN THE BIGGNING AND IN THE END OF THE GAME
-LEVEL SYSTEM FROM EASY TO HARD
-FANTASTIC GRAPHIC
-MISSION SYSTEM

*ARENA OF DEATH:
-FIGHT ENEMIES IN ROUNDS(ROUNDS GO FROM EASY TO HARD)

*MULTIPLAYER:
-CHAT BOX
-CITY AND FOREST

THAT HAVE BEEN CAPTURED BY SCI FI ENEMIES , COMPLETE MISSION AND LOT OF LEVELS(FROM EASY TO HARD) THIS GAME CONTAIN ARENA AND SPECIAL STORY AND MULTIPLAYER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 7
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3 OR Mojave OR HIGHER
  • Processor: 1.6GHz dual-core Intel Core i5, Turbo Boost up to 3.6GHz, with 4MB L3 cache
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617 OR HIGHER
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3 OR Mojave OR HIGHER
  • Processor: 1.6GHz dual-core Intel Core i7, Turbo Boost up to 3.6GHz, with 4MB L3 cache
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617 OR HIGHER
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Rabie Haddad built the The Edge Of The World Z game and i want to tell you that my game can be published on steam only and not on other sites for free .
